title: Celiac Disease Diagnosis and Treatment Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and experience in gastroenterology practice
context.additional_context: A blended education course for current medical professionals using smartphone-based learning materials. Validates practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the diagnostic criteria for celiac disease (ESPGHAN/ACG guidelines) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can establish differential diagnoses and treatment plans through patient case analysis
Learners can propose at least three gluten-free dietary management strategies
Learners can analyze diagnostic error cases to develop prevention strategies
Learners can create patient education materials and evaluate their effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
